search-paths.Name: Search Paths
search-paths.Hint: Configure folders, Rolltables and s3 buckets to be searched for art here.

forge-search-paths.Name: Forge Assets Library Paths
forge-search-paths.Hint: Configure your API key and Asset Library paths

window.Hint: API Key to be used by 'Token Variant Art' to share images with other players. API Key is available in the 'My Account' page.

search-filters.Name: Search Filter Settings
search-filters.Hint: Assign filters to Portrait and Token art searches.

portrait-filter.Name: Portrait Art Filters
portrait-filter.Hint: Portrait art will be limited to files that include/exclude these pieces of text or match the provided regular expression.

token-filter.Name: Token Art Filters
token-filter.Hint: Token art will be limited to files that include/exclude these pieces of text or match the provided regular expression.

general-filter.Name: General Art Filters
general-filter.Hint: These filters will be used when the search is being performed irrespective of the art type (token/portrait).

randomizer.Name: Randomizer Settings
randomizer.Hint: Enable randomization of images upon actor and token creation.

window.search-types-heading: Searches to be included in the randomizer
window.pop-up-if-randomization-disabled: Show Art Select pop-up if randomization is disabled
window.different-images: Different images for Portrait and Token
window.sync-images: Sync Portrait and Token based on image name similarity

two-pop-ups.Name: Display separate pop-ups for Portrait and Token art
two-pop-ups.Hint: When enabled 2 separate pop-ups will be displayed upon Actor/Token creation, first to select the Portrait art, and second to select the Token art.

no-dialog.Name: Disable prompt between Portrait and Token art select
no-dialog.Hint: Will disable the prompt displayed upon Token/Actor creation when two separate pop-ups setting is enabled.

token-hud.Name: Token HUD Client Settings
token-hud.Hint: Settings for the Token HUD Button

enable-token-hud.Name: Enable Token HUD Button
enable-token-hud.Hint: Enable extra Token HUD button for selecting token art.

display-shared-only.Name: Display only shared images
display-shared-only.Hint: Only shared images will be shown in the side menu. Search can still be performed.

display-as-image.Name: Display as Image
display-as-image.Hint: Disable to display images as a list of their filenames in the HUD.

image-opacity.Name: Opacity of token preview
image-opacity.Hint: The opacity of the token previews in the HUD before hovering over them.

update-actor-image.Name: Update Actor portrait
update-actor-image.Hint: When enabled selecting an image from the Token HUD will also apply it to the character sheet.

disable-if-token-hud-wildcard-active.Name: Disable button
disable-if-token-hud-wildcard-active.Hint: This option will prevent 'Token Variant Art' button being displayed if 'Token HUD Wildcard' is active and 'Randomize Wildcard Images' is checked in the Prototype token.

include-wildcard.Name: Include wildcard images
include-wildcard.Hint: If prototype token has been setup with a wildcard image they will be included in the HUD menu.

keywords-search.Name: Search by Keyword
keywords-search.Hint: Searches will use both full name and individual words in the name of the actor/token. Words less than 3 characters will be ignored.

excluded-keywords.Name: Excluded Keywords
excluded-keywords.Hint: This is a list of keywords that will not be included in the search when 'Search by Keyword' is on.

run-search-on-path.Name: Match name to folder
run-search-on-path.Hint: Whe enabled art searches will check both file names as well as folder names along their path for a match.

imgur-client-id.Name: Imgur Client ID
imgur-client-id.Hint: Client ID to be used to perform Imgur API calls with.

disable-notifs.Name: Disable Cache Notifications
disable-notifs.Hint: Disables notifications shown by the module during caching.

window.compendium-select: Select an unlocked compendium to perform mappings on
window.missing-only: Only include documents with missing images
window.diff-images: Apply different images for Portrait and Token
window.show-images: Show current images in the 'Art Select' window
window.auto-art-select: Display 'Art Select' if no image found
window.sync-images: Sync Portrait and Token if only one image is missing

algorithm.Name: Search Settings
algorithm.Hint: Configure the algorithm and filters used to perform image searches

window.exact-hint: Token/Actor names need to be fully present in the file/folder name
window.fuzzy-hint: Token/Actor names require only partial matches to the file/folder name
window.limit-hint: Maximum number of results returned per search

percentage-match.Name: Percentage match
percentage-match.Hint: How accurately file/folder name must match for it to be considered a match.

art-select-slider.Name: Add the percent slider to the Art Select window
art-select-slider.Hint: Percentage slider will appear in the Art Select pop-ups, allowing you to change the percentage match on the fly

art-select.apply-same-art: Apply the same art to the token?

status-config.hint: Order in which the image will be updated if multiple effects/status are applied. If they have same priority recency will be used instead.

warn.profile-image-not-found: Token-Variant-Art: Unable to find profile image to assign right-click listener.
warn.invalid-table: The table "{rollTableName}" could not be found
warn.update-image-no-token-actor: Calling 'updateImage' with no valid Token or Actor as update target.
warn.imgur-localhost: Imgur galleries cannot be accessed through clients running on 'localhost'

info.caching-finished: Token Variant Art: Caching Finished ({imageCount} images found)
